metadata.description: Venus is blessed with, not only beauty, but power, forcing her to do super hero work on the side. Soon, she discovers a mysterious Olympian working with the hi-tech assassin group, which has marked their next target, Taylor Darcy, heir to the Darcy fortune and the most eligible bachelor in Hollywood. Now, Venus must watch over the spoiled Darcy, teaching him the mysterious ways of romance and to protect his ass from the assassin's big guns! A hardboiled action adventure mixed with the classic screwball comedy, you don't want to miss Venus in her first solo book! Come discover the love as only Venus can show you!
metadata.name: Odyssey Presents Venus (Bluewater)
